item.description:
Agenda

  • 07:00 - 07:30 Fast networking, exchange business cards
  • 07:30 - 08:00 Getting Your Brand Online (2): Competing on Analytics & Google Analytics 101
  • 08:00 - 08:30 Bring your own challenges - discussion, networking


About the Presentation:
We'll discuss why measurement a.k.a. "analytics" across all mediums is extremely crucial when it comes to competing online. I'll present some products available in this space and introduce folks to Google Analytics. We'll touch upon implementation and look at statistics on a live website.

About the Presenter:
Nirmal is Founder and CEO of Digital Wavefront, a company specializing in Internet applications and emerging technologies. Nirmal brings over 14 years of industry experience working with companies in realizing their marketing and technology objectives. Project engagements include clients like Microsoft, Intel, Oracle, HP, RiteAid, Portland Rose Festival, Unicru [now Kronos] and SensorIQ. He's also a founding member of two other start-ups.

Digital Wavefront: http://www.digitalwav...
Internet Strategy | Websites & SEO | Database & Analytics | Performance Marketing | Emerging Technologies

About "Getting Your Brand Online" Series:
This will be a series of topics about tools and methods of marketing and creating a brand online.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the backroom. There are two metered parking lots near by.

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group
